member.name: T:MyCaffe.layers.alpha.LayerFactory
member.summary: The LayerFactor is responsible for creating all layers implemented in the MyCaffe.layers.ssd namespace.

member.name: M:MyCaffe.layers.alpha.LayerFactory.CreateDouble(MyCaffe.common.CudaDnn{System.Double},MyCaffe.basecode.Log,MyCaffe.param.LayerParameter,MyCaffe.basecode.CancelEvent,MyCaffe.basecode.IXImageDatabaseBase)
member.summary: Create the layers when using the double base type.
member.param: Specifies the connection to the low-level CUDA interfaces.
Specifies an interface to the image database, who's use is optional.
member.returns: If supported, the layer is returned, otherwise null is returned.

member.name: M:MyCaffe.layers.alpha.LayerFactory.CreateSingle(MyCaffe.common.CudaDnn{System.Single},MyCaffe.basecode.Log,MyCaffe.param.LayerParameter,MyCaffe.basecode.CancelEvent,MyCaffe.basecode.IXImageDatabaseBase)
member.summary: Create the layers when using the float base type.
member.param: Specifies the connection to the low-level CUDA interfaces.
Specifies an interface to the image database, who's use is optional.
member.returns: If supported, the layer is returned, otherwise null is returned.
